description:
Selling on Amazon can change your life!

More than 3,100 enrolled and on their way to MORE MONEY this year!

If you're looking for a way to create substantial income soon - get in and get started. You'll make excellent income, and you can work from home!

There's NO TIME TO WASTE!

You can make life-changing money selling part time on Amazon. Learn how, by someone who KNOWS - taught by an Amazon best-seller (the Amazon Sales Ninja has listed more than 77,000 items)!

Sell your Art or Photography on your own FREE.

The Guarantee: If you follow the Amazon Sales Ninja's instructions - step-by-step - you income WILL grow, and you can earn a living with YOUR Amazon sales business!
_________________________________________________

A RECENT REVIEW ...

"This course is different from the normal Amazon FBA courses in that the instructor talks and demonstrates the PRACTICAL nuts and volts business of DOING FBA based on her many years of experience. There is no boring talk about marketing and website design and all the other stuff you can find on the internet. She shows you the inner workings of Seller Central and there are some nice demos at the end where she fulfills orders in real time! We need more courses this style of teaching!"

_________________________________________________

In the past 20 years, Amazon has become one of the world's most profitable marketplaces - for people just like you!

Maybe they knew a something about books or opera or baseball or mah jong - YOU can make money selling on Amazon!

From books to electronics, toys to jewelry - and even groceries - almost ANYTHING can be sold profitably on Amazon.

And, ANYBODY can do it!

Co-instructed by Udemy best-seller, Robert Scot (Dr. YouTube) and Marilyn Sager (the Amazon Sales Ninja), this course is both deeply educational and highly entertaining.

The team doesn't skip a thing.

You'll see why they call Marilyn "the Amazon Sales Ninja," as she takes you from what type of bank account you should open to what you should sell - and why!

The Course even includes tips and advice on expanding your business into Fullfilment By Amazon - when you should do it - and why.
title: Amazon Sales for Newbies: Learn from an Amazon Top-Seller
